reviewsJson.markdown:
## **⭐ GRM Samoan Dreams**       ( *Overall Grade:* **C+** )

||||||
|:---:|:---:|---|:---:|:---|
|**Hardware**|RDA / RTA||**Sweetness**|🔵 🔵 🔵 🔵 🔵 ⚪ ⚪ |
|**Style**|DTL||**Juiciness**|🔵 🔵 🔵 ⚪ ⚪ ⚪ ⚪ |
|**Concentration**|10% to 15%||**Mouth Feel**|🔵 🔵 🔵 🔵 ⚪ ⚪ ⚪ |
|**Steeped**|10 - 15 days||**Throat Hit**|🔵 🔵 🔵 🔵 🔵 ⚪ ⚪ |

|||
|:---:|:---|
|**🔺PROS🔺**||
|**🔻CONS🔻**||
|**🔸TAGS🔸**|: 🔥 Coil Killer :|
|**🔸USES🔸**|: All by Itself :|

----------  

* **TARGET FLAVOR**  
The Gremlins Take on a popular cookie flavor. - Chocolate, Caramel and Coconut combine to make this one hard to resist.  

* **ACCURACY :**   🔴 🔴 🔴 ⚪ ⚪   CLOSE - BUT COULD BE BETTER  

----------  
**🔹 Flavor Description 🔹**  
My first try at 15% flavoring let me with a dry unpleasant experience even after sufficient steep time. With a hint from the community, I considered testing it at 10% flavoring.
With the mix at 10% off the shake, I could identify that that's getting more pleasant but I would recommend giving it 10 days steep time.
There is an overall present caramel which presents to me on the inhale. Quite a dark taste which could be going into a dryness on my palate. I can taste a cookie middle part, which has the right taste and presence but no texture. I can't identify any real coconut in it, not even a hint.
Trying this one-shot in a mix I discovered that I need to crank up my regular wattage a 10-15% to reduce dryness in the vape.
I still have a dry aftertaste from vaping it even using the higher wattage.  

**🔹 Comments 🔹**  
This is a very dark concentrate and that's always something I try to avoid. This brings the overall grade together with the lack of flavor in some areas down to a C.
This concentrate is available at Bull City Flavors or directly at Gremberry Farms. Recommended usage for me is 10 %.
reviewsJson.author: Steve-TC
reviewsJson.title: Samoan Dreams
